text:
A seven-day pongala festival at the 600-year-old Karikkakom Chamundi Temple would begin on March 15, said Vikraman Nair, president, and Gopakumar, joint secretary, here on Sunday.

Addressing reporters, trustees said the festival would end on March 21, and women from across Kerala and neighbouring Kanyakumari would take part in large numbers.
title: Pongala festival from tomorrow
